meanings.definition: The state of being confused or bewildered.
meanings.sent1: Her mazednesses were evident as she tried to navigate the maze.
meanings.sent2: The mazednesses on his face showed he had lost his way in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The mazednesses in her mind made her accidentally wear mismatched shoes.
meanings.sent4: His mazednesses were like a tangled ball of yarn, impossible to unravel.
meanings.sent5: The mazednesses in the dark cave felt like a never-ending puzzle.

meanings.definition: The quality of being amazed or astonished.
meanings.sent1: The mazednesses in her eyes when she saw the magic trick were priceless.
meanings.sent2: His mazednesses at the sight of the shooting star were truly genuine.
meanings.sent3: The mazednesses of the puppy seeing snow for the first time was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The mazednesses on their faces were like fireworks of surprise.
meanings.sent5: The mazednesses in the crowd when the magician made the elephant disappear was unforgettable.
